item.description:
We are very excited to offer a new event in 2009 - a 5K
sponsored by Blue Back Square in West Hartford, Connecticut.

Join us at Blue Back Square in West Hartford for this
special holiday 5K to benefit our neighbors in need.
The 5K course winds through the wide avenues of West Hartford Center,
past festive shop windows and neighborhoods decorated for the season.
Start, finish and post race refreshments in Blue Back Square.

Don't put away those running shoes too soon! You'll want to lace up and
be at the starting line on December 6, 2009 - 10:30 a.m. start.
item.name: Blue Back Square Holiday5K Run
